items.label: Convert Client Submission Into a Campaign

become-a-member.title: Become a Member
become-a-member.description: To advance from an Sidekick to a Member, you will need to be Championed by an existing Adbongo Org Member. Once you find a Champion, you can stake "Super" $SAVEx Tokens with he/she.  These wrapped erc20 (Ethereum) tokens are integral to our platform.  We call these "super", based on the recent implementation of the superfluid protocol. See the Champion a New Member for how this works.

become-a-sidekick.title: Become a Sidekick
become-a-sidekick.description: Adbongo Org has instituted a new onboarding process through the utilization of Cohorts.

champion-a-member.title: Champion a New Member
champion-a-member.description: Adbongo Org grows organically, adding new members as individual existing members deem appropriate and champion them in. Our championing process relies both on the Champion being a good judge of who is a good fit for the Dao as well as on the Champion’s reputation within the Dao being at stake.

client-instructions.title: Instructions for Client Payment
client-instructions.description: The Campaign party lead is responsible for working with the client to help them make their deposit into the escrow. The following deposit instructions can be shared with clients:

commission-process.title: Commission Process
commission-process.description: After the Campaign enters Prepping for Campaign, the Cleric who led the consultation is responsible for gathering additional Campaigners as is necessary to scope out the full project.

community-overview.title: Overview
community-overview.description: There are a few meetings each week that we encourage all Dao Members to attend.  Campaign Rally is a meeting for Dao members to discuss progress across different RIPs and Campaigns, as well as provide teams in the _Preparing for Campaign phase with possible personnel for their Campaign/RIP.

community-social-media.title: Socials + Media
community-social-media.description: Here you can find the official Adbongo social & Media channels.

convert-client-submission.title: Convert Client Submission Into a Campaign

discord-bots.title: Discord Bots
discord-bots.description: Do Adbongo Org Bots Dream of Electric Tweets?

discord-channels.title: Channels
discord-channels.description: Within the Adbongo Org Discord, you’ll notice a suite of Categories each full of different sub-channels. Here’s what you need to know about each.  You can join discord here//discord.gg/5Cnkpgrgvd)

discord-etiquette.title: Etiquette
discord-etiquette.description: Before we get down and dirty, you should know that discord is the central communications hub for all things Adbongo Org.  With that in mind, there are some things you should know before you jump into the discord and begin taking up projects.

discord-getting-started.title: Getting Started
discord-getting-started.description: You can join the Discord [here] (https://discord.gg/5Cnkpgrgvd), If you have been assigned a “Adbongo Org Member” role, then you will be able to access all of Adbongo Org’s internal channels.

discord-navigation-help.title: Navigation
discord-navigation-help.description: There’s a lot going on in our Discord. Please never hesitate to ask questions if you get lost. The best place to do so is in #Tavern as an Apprentice or in #general or #ops as a Guilder.

dispute.title: In Case of Dispute
dispute.description: -   If the client loses confidence in the campaign party at any time, they may Lock the remaining funds in escrow so that they cannot be released or withdrawn.

doc1.title: Style Guide
doc1.description: You can write content using GitHub-flavored Markdown syntax.

doc2.title: Document Number 2
doc2.description: This is a link to another document. This is a link to an external page.

glossary.title: Glossary
glossary.description: A running list of Adbongo nomenclature. Always evolving, forever in progress…

happy-path.title: Happy Path
happy-path.description: WARNING: Never send funds (tokens or ETH) directly to the escrow smart contract. Those funds will not be recoverable.

helping-docs.title: How Tos
helping-docs.description: How To: The Bridge to xDAI and wxDAI

how-does-it-work.title: How Does It Work?
how-does-it-work.description: Adbongo has developed an on-chain escrow service to facilitate payments from clients. Using the Adbongo escrow:

interacting-with-escrow.title: Interacting With the Escrow
interacting-with-escrow.description: -   As the warning above states, _never send ETH or ERC20 tokens directly to the escrow contract_. They will be lost forever. All deposits into an escrow must happen via the Deposit function. This can be done easily via the escrow app.

join-a-campaign.title: Join a campaign
join-a-campaign.description: Any member with at least one Share is eligible to join an existing campaign.

lead-a-campaign.title: Lead a Campaign
lead-a-campaign.description: Well well well! Welcome to the big leagues.

mdx.title: Powered by MDX
mdx.description: You can write JSX and use React components within your Markdown thanks to MDX.

migration-to-xdai.title: Migration to xDAI
migration-to-xdai.description: On February 18, 2021, Adbongo Org migrated its on-chain DAO to the xDAI network in order to reduce the burden of high gas fees on Ethereum mainnet and facilitate more on-chain interactions, governance, and experimentation.

overview-code-of-conduct.title: Code of Conduct
overview-code-of-conduct.description: Before we dive in, here is a quick code of conduct to keep in mind:

overview-covenant.title: Covenant
overview-covenant.description: (b) Trust Members shall have the rights, powers and privileges that are possible to be taken

overview-molochv3-primer.title: Moloch V3
overview-molochv3-primer.description: Adbongo Org utilizes the daohaus framework. A great overview of Moloch V3 and it’s benefits can be found here.

overview-roles.title: Roles
overview-roles.description: Just as with any strong Discord, we use Roles to showcase different skill sets. These Roles are used to Summon Guilders for different campaigns, and should only be assigned if you can be called upon to complete the necessary tasks associated with each of them.

overview-save-guild-shares.title: Save Guild Shares
overview-save-guild-shares.description: All Shares are non-transferable and unique to the DAO being used (in this case Adbongo Org).

proposal-types.title: Proposal Types
proposal-types.description: Members can make a number of different proposals including:

rips.title: RIPs
rips.description: Apply for SIP Funding. (THIS COMES LATER IN THE DAO)

summon-a-campaign-party.title: Summon a SAVE Party
summon-a-campaign-party.description: The best place to Summon new Members for a SAVE is in the DAO DISCORD HQ #save-campaign channel by tagging the roles in question.
